overview: Animal Trainer is Rocco's hardest and nastiest series of tapes ever, and each one raises the bar a little further. Here we are up to #3, and this one promises not to disappoint; it's an all-anal extravaganza which features a series of different gang bangs, complete with sloppy blow-jobs, gaping assholes... and a horse! (in a non-sex role, of course!)
title: Rocco: Animal Trainer 3
